item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储利率决议进入倒计时。亢奋的股市涨势让同一家公司的策略师们感到困惑。日本央行结束负政策利率后日元暴跌。以下是市场动向。【原文：Good morning. The countdown to the Federal Reserve’s rate decision begins. The euphoric stock market rally confounds strategists within the same firm. The yen slumps after the Bank of Japan ends its negative policy rate. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 印度基础设施贷款机构考虑出售债券，以筹集高达 48 亿美元的资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度国家基础设施与发展融资银行计划发行 4000 亿卢比（约合 48 亿美元）的本币债券，这家新成立的印度贷款机构的目标是将其贷款发放量提高一倍以上。【原文：National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development plans to raise up to 400 billion rupees ($4.8 billion) in local currency bonds, according to people familiar with the matter, as the newly created Indian lender aims to more than double its loans disbursement.】

item.title: Linden Capital Partners 考虑出售少数股权
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Linden Capital Partners 正在探索战略选择，包括出售少数股权。【原文：Linden Capital Partners is exploring strategic options including the sale of a minority stake, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印尼将在货币决策繁忙周维持关键利率不变
item.description: 印尼央行可能将连续第五个月维持基准利率不变，以支撑印尼盾，在美国货币宽松政策变得更加明朗之前，决策者不太可能采取行动。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank will probably leave its benchmark interest rate unchanged for a fifth straight month to support the rupiah, with policymakers seen unlikely to move until a monetary easing by the US becomes clearer.】

item.title: 亚洲股市跟随美国股市反弹，关注美联储：市场综述
item.description: 在美联储做出决定之前，华尔街交易员将美国基准股价推向历史新高，亚洲股市也将随之上涨。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to rise after Wall Street traders sent US benchmarks to fresh all-time highs before the Federal Reserve decision.】

item.title: 自由港液化天然气公司维修后将增产 10
item.description: 自由港液化天然气公司首席执行官在接受采访时说，维修工作将于 5 月初结束，之后该公司将增加液化天然气的产量。【原文：Freeport LNG will increase its production of liquefied natural gas following repairs that are due to be concluded in early May, the company’s chief executive officer said in an interview.】

item.title: Bill Hwang 称银行数据加强了他在 Archegos 倒闭案中的辩护
item.description: Archegos Capital Management 公司的 Bill Hwang 说，他从银行获得的信息支持了他在与政府就其投资基金是否操纵其投资组合中的相关证券而进行的长期斗争中的论点。【原文：Archegos Capital Management’s Bill Hwang said he received information from banks that bolsters his arguments in a long-running fight with the government over whether his investment fund manipulated the underlying securities in its portfolio.】

item.title: 迪拜证交所计划出售 16 亿美元纳斯达克股份
item.description: 纳斯达克公司的最大股东迪拜交易所（Borse Dubai）正在出售其持有的大约三分之一的纳斯达克股份（2700 万股）。【原文：Nasdaq Inc.’s biggest shareholder, Borse Dubai, is selling roughly one third of its stake — or 27 million shares — in the exchange operator.】

item.title: 杰夫-库里称，如果美联储减息，大宗商品将进一步反弹
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group LP）的杰夫-库里（Jeff Currie）认为，如果美国联邦储备委员会在未来几个月内降息，大宗商品价格将有更大的反弹空间。【原文：Commodities prices have more room to rally if the US Federal Reserve cuts interest rates in coming months, according to Carlyle Group LP’s Jeff Currie.】

item.title: 科威特大型炼油厂生产重油以满足欧佩克+减产要求
item.description: 科威特正在三个炼油厂加紧加工原油，以遵守与欧佩克+达成的自愿石油减产协议。【原文：Kuwait is cranking up crude processing at its three refineries as the nation complies with voluntary oil production curtailments agreed with OPEC+.】

item.title: 债券交易员因担心美联储减息希望破灭而加大空头押注
item.description: 债券交易商正在加大对国债的空头押注，并买入衍生品以防范抛售，以应对美联储将调低市场对今年降息预期的风险。【原文：Bond traders are stepping up short bets against Treasuries and buying derivatives to protect against a selloff, positioning for the risk that the Federal Reserve will dial back the market’s expectations for interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 贝莱德向美国证券交易委员会提交申请，与代币化公司 Securitize 共同发行基金
item.description: 贝莱德公司正准备通过与数字资产专业公司Securitize合作发行一只基金，成为华尔街最新一家尝试将资金投入区块链的巨头。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is preparing to offer a fund through a partnership with digital-asset specialist Securitize, making it the latest Wall Street behemoth to experiment with putting money on blockchains.】

item.title: 危机进入新阶段，中国建筑商面临重组问题
item.description: 中国的房地产债务危机已进入一个新阶段，紧张局势日益转向开发商与债权人就债务重组计划进行的法庭斗争，以及曾经不可想象的清盘令后果。【原文：China’s property-debt crisis has entered a new stage, as tensions have increasingly shifted to developers’ court battles with creditors over debt restructuring plans, and the once-unthinkable consequence of liquidation orders.】

item.title: 资金市场预示美联储有时间考虑缩减资产缩减规模
item.description: 在美联储决定如何以及何时放慢从金融体系中抽走过多现金的步伐之际，美国融资市场出现了令人鼓舞的迹象。【原文：US funding markets are offering signs of encouragement to the Federal Reserve as it determines exactly how and when to slow the pace at which it drains excess cash from the financial system.】

item.title: EQT 首席执行官警告天然气存储不足将引发价格波动
item.description: 美国最大的天然气生产商负责人警告说，管道和储存设施的缺乏将在未来几年引发价格剧烈波动，导致天然气价格飙升 350%。【原文：The chief of the largest US producer of natural gas has warned that a lack of pipelines and storage facilities will trigger dramatic price swings in the years ahead, causing them to surge as much 350%.】

item.title: 贡渥集团称，即使没有欧佩克+的减产，下一季度石油价格也将在85-90美元之间波动
item.description: 贡渥集团（Gunvor Group Ltd.）全球研究与分析主管表示，即使欧佩克+产油国及其盟国决定不延长目前的减产协议，第三季度的油价也可能在每桶85-90美元左右。【原文：Oil prices likely will trade at about $85-$90 a barrel in the third quarter even if OPEC+ producers and allies decide not to extend current supply cuts, said Gunvor Group Ltd.’s global head of research and analysis.】

item.title: Braskem 称 Novonor 公司股权有了新的潜在买家
item.description: 一个新的竞争对手加入了拉丁美洲领先石化公司 Braskem 多数股权的争夺战。【原文：A new competitor has entered the race for a majority stake in Latin America’s leading petrochemical company Braskem.】

item.title: BTG 亿万富翁埃斯特韦斯说：人工智能炒作损害了新兴市场
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁、BTG Pactual SA 银行创始人安德烈-埃斯特维斯（Andre Esteves）认为，人工智能股票的持续上涨正在帮助发展中国家的资本市场流失资金。【原文：The relentless rally in artificial-intelligence stocks is helping drain money from capital markets across developing nations, according to Andre Esteves, the Brazilian billionaire founder of Banco BTG Pactual SA.】

item.title: SAS 航空公司 12 亿美元重组案获法院批准
item.description: 斯堪的纳维亚航空公司 SAS AB 的债务重组获得了破产法院的批准，该重组由法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）和私募股权公司 Castlelake LP 出资 12 亿美元进行。【原文：Scandinavian airline SAS AB won bankruptcy court approval on a debt restructuring funded by a $1.2 billion investment anchored by Air France-KLM and private equity firm Castlelake LP.】

item.title: 投资者反驳华盛顿州 11 亿美元市政债券交易
item.description: 华盛顿州即将进行债务再融资的大型交易将导致旧市政债券的持有者面临潜在损失，该交易正遭到投资者的反对。【原文：The state of Washington is getting pushback from investors on an upcoming mega deal to refinance debt that would cause holders of the old municipal bonds to face potential losses.】

item.title: 阿波罗第三支混合价值基金目标至少 60 亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. aims to raise at least $6 billion for a strategy that provides financing that sits between debt and equity, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 超微公司将 200 万股股票出售推迟至收盘后
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，超微计算机公司将出售 200 万股股票的预期定价时间推迟到纽约股市收盘后。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. pushed back the expected pricing of the sale of 2 million shares to after the market closes in New York, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Coinbase 首席执行官称近期故障后交易所基础设施需要升级
item.description: Coinbase Global Inc.首席执行官布赖恩-阿姆斯特朗（Brian Armstrong）表示，在比特币价格于2月底开始飙升时，用户在购买和出售比特币时遇到了问题，因此该公司需要投入更多资金来改善其交易基础设施。【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. Chief Executive Officer Brian Armstrong said the company will need to pump more money into improving its trading infrastructure after users experienced problems buying and selling as the price of Bitcoin began surging at the end of February.】

item.title: 微策略公司 2022 年以来最糟糕的下滑显示比特币代理风险
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. investors who bought shares of the biggest corporate holder of Bitcoin to gain amped-up exposure to the digital asset are getting a painful reminder of its brutal volatility.】

item.title: Sycamore Partners 探讨竞购服装制造商 Gildan Activewear
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Sycamore Partners 正在探讨对加拿大服装制造商 Gildan Activewear Inc.【原文：Private equity firm Sycamore Partners is exploring an offer for Gildan Activewear Inc., the Canadian clothing manufacturer that owns the American Apparel brand, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 对许多饱受通胀之苦的阿根廷人来说，比特币正在取代美元
item.description: 阿根廷人正在购买比特币，以抵御 276% 的通货膨胀，而不是急于将比索兑换成美元，这颠覆了使这个危机频发的国家成为世界上最受欢迎的绿卡购买地之一的永恒战略。【原文：Argentines are buying Bitcoin to protect themselves from 276% inflation instead of rushing to exchange pesos for dollars, upending a timeless strategy that’s made the crisis-prone country one of the top places for greenbacks in the world.】

item.title: 贷款不确定性导致泰晤士水务母公司债券跌至历史最低点
item.description: 由于下月到期的一笔贷款仍存在不确定性，泰晤士水务有限公司（Thames Water Ltd. ）控股公司肯布尔水务财务有限公司（Kemble Water Finance Ltd. ）发行的债券周二跌至历史新低。【原文：A bond issued by Thames Water Ltd.’s holding company Kemble Water Finance Ltd. slumped to a record low on Tuesday as uncertainty continues over a loan due next month.】

item.title: 纽约银行投资者贝林斯基称银行多元化是一项长期计划
item.description: Reverence Capital Partners 的联合创始人米尔顿-贝林斯基（Milton Berlinski）表示，纽约社区银行的重组需要很长时间，他的公司向这家陷入困境的银行注资 2 亿美元后，他加入了这家地区性贷款机构的董事会。【原文：A reworking of New York Community Bancorp will take a long time, said Reverence Capital Partners co-founder Milton Berlinski, who joined the regional lender’s board after his firm injected $200 million into the embattled bank.】

item.title: 卖空者 Block 说他更 "看空 "Blackstone 抵押贷款信托基金了
item.description: 卖空者 Carson Block 表示，他的公司越来越 "看空 "Blackstone Mortgage Trust，理由是多户房产出现问题。【原文：Short seller Carson Block said his firm has grown “more bearish” on Blackstone Mortgage Trust, citing troubles with multifamily properties.】

item.title: 核心通胀指标为加拿大央行提供减税空间
item.description: 加拿大央行关注的基本价格压力的主要衡量指标显示，通货紧缩已取得广泛进展，为转向更宽松的政策奠定了基础。【原文：Key measures for underlying price pressures that the Bank of Canada is watching show broad disinflation progress, setting the stage for a pivot to easier policy.】
